custom_line_width=”50″][vc_column_text]

Architectural Surface Finishing

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Architectural finishes are described as a final finishing for horizontal and vertical (interior and exterior) surfaces of a structure. For hundreds of years, they have been an integral part of architecture and building design; serving both functional and aesthetic purposes. These finishes make a significant contribution to the beauty of buildings and structures.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit” column_padding_position=”all” column_element_spacing=”default” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”1/2″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1627132132985{margin-top: 50px !important;margin-left: 30px !important;}”]“[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1627116360424{margin-top: -60px !important;padding-right: 80px !important;padding-left: 80px !important;}”]

Architectural Surface Finishes make a significant contribution to the beauty of buildings and structures.

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1627116371780{margin-top: -10px !important;padding-right: 80px !important;}”]

”

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”in_container” full_screen_row_position=”middle” column_margin=”default” column_direction=”default” border_radius=”none” box_shadow=”none” image_loading=”default” max_width=”100%” max_width_mobile=”default”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit” column_padding_position=”right” column_element_spacing=”default” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”1/2″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][vc_column_text]Our unlimited range of finishing processes is available in diverse colours and textures to help our clients select the most suitable hues and textures for their projects. We are sustainable in all our operations and utilise an environmentally friendly finishing process while still delivering a superior, more colourful and durable finish.  To ensure the highest quality product, we only use high-quality colours and pigments from market leaders and recognized manufacturer’s who have pioneered their unique brand of architectural powders/paints complying with international standards such as AAMA, Qualicoat and British Standard (BS).

We are a licensed applicator of Jotun Powder Coating, Akzo Nobel, Sherwin Williams, PPG, Spectrum and Axalta powder Coatings to name a few. Our significant investment in coating technology has led to the development of a system that is designed to meet the diverse and aesthetic needs of today’s demands for a superior finish on architectural aluminium and steel.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]
